name: loveminebooty
text: This is not just a woman‚Äôs problem. This is EVERYONE‚ÄôS problem. How disconnected do you have to be to not see that? #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: Robbery of rights, robbery of freedom, robbery of agency. That people are more concerned with the image of a continent than of the self-image of a woman. That male privilege is something lorded over us again and again and again. #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: I am angry ‚Äì that people‚Äôs lives are being ruined. That dreams are being crushed. That a child who growing up is told ‚Äúyou can be whatever you want!‚Äù and arrives to university for THIS. This is robbery. #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: Defending their actions with words like ‚Äúit was a joke‚Äù; they made their desires clear. They crossed lines with (underaged) women but because they didn‚Äôt use the word ‚Äúsex‚Äù or actually engage, they‚Äôre still given plausible deniability??? #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: I am disgusted ‚Äì by the idea that despite the clear and obvious interactions that took place between the journalists and so-called educators, on top of everything, these professors proceeded to gaslight their victims #BBCAfricaEye

name: KeLLy Ifeanyi
text: Sex for Grades: undercover inside Nigerian and Ghanaian universities - BBC Africa Eye documentary https://youtu.be/we-F0Gi0Lqs¬†

name: loveminebooty
text: But with the knowledge that the power structure & imbalances set in place by society, by culture, & by system would protect them from any sort of accountability, from any sort of responsibility/ consequence #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: The way that some of these men looked at their victims, not as human beings, which ironically are words used to justify their apparent inability to control their sexual desires #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: I am sad ‚Äì for the simple fact that although this is a struggle that also exists here in the West, it is a privilege that we have to know that this could not occur so overtly and with such irreverent and shameless abandon #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: Sex For Grades is not something that should not continue to be an unspoken truth, to preserve the identities of those who do not care for women #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: Make no mistake ‚Äì we have operated in a cultural cloak of silence for far too long #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: But simultaneously glad that the cries of my sisters back home are finally being heard, acknowledged and validated within the #MeToo era #BBCAfricaEye

name: loveminebooty
text: What a peculiar position I have found myself in. To be both deeply embarrassed for Ghana, for Africa that this how we choose to present ourselves to the world #BBCAfricaEye

name: Zoe Flood
text:
Looking for a Sunday evening watch?
